name: Unnatural Disasters io
description:
UNNATURAL DISASTERS is a frantic destruction game full of unexpected Disasters!

What happens when you mix the power of nature with crazy unexpected elements? MASSIVE UNNATURAL DESTRUCTIVE POWER!
Fusion Mother Nature's wrath with powerful science to avenge the nasty humans` environmental destruction!


GAME FEATURES

*Simple and intuitive game controls!
*Easy to learn, easy to master mechanics!
*Fun destructible environments!
*Disasters merge mechanic!
Powerful and original unnatural disasters!
